disease: Malignant neoplasm of overlapping sites of oropharynx

vital_signs.temperature: May be elevated in the presence of infection
vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in the presence of pain or infection
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated in the presence of pain or infection
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in the presence of pain or infection

physical_findings: Ulceration or lesion in the oropharynx
Lymphadenopathy (swollen lymph nodes) in the neck
Pain on palpation of the neck

imaging_findings.CT scan: May show mass in the oropharynx, lymph node involvement
imaging_findings.MRI: May show mass in the oropharynx, lymph node involvement, extent of tumor invasion
imaging_findings.PET scan: May show metabolic activity of the tumor

required: Clinical findings suggestive of oropharyngeal cancer
Imaging findings consistent with oropharyngeal cancer
